word_mean: 西〔谷〕米〔西谷椰子淀粉〕：主要来自各种棕榈木髓的淀粉，特别是来自西米属(Sagus)植物

sentence.Network_en: Sago is starch obtained from sago palms, native of India.
sentence.Network_cn: 西米粉是由印度当地的西米椰子做的淀粉.

sentence.Network_en: Bring 400 ml water to boil and add in the taro and sago.
sentence.Network_cn: 烧开一锅水,将西米用水清洗一下,入滚水锅中.

sentence.Network_en: Turn cold water rinse the sago under the water.
sentence.Network_cn: 把西米倒入过滤网,然后冲凉水备用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 我们常吃的西米(sago)，又叫做西谷米，事实上它不是米，也不是种出来的果实或种子，是加工制造出来的。在马来西亚和巴布亚新几 …

淀粉样物是透明的,在脾组织的背景下呈深棕色,淀粉样物的沉积处大多为白髓的部位,由于外观象西米,故有西米脾(sago spleen) 之称。 物-6 肾淀粉样变肉眼所见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Malay sagu (originally via Portuguese)

entry.tran: 西谷米，西米(一种由棕榈茎髓制成的可用于制作甜布丁的白色物质)
entry.def: Sago is a white substance obtained from the trunk of some palm trees. Sago is used for making sweet puddings.

means.word_mean: 1. powdery starch from certain sago palms; used in Asia as a food thickener and textile stiffener
